creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by William Perreault
description: very low wooden platform chair with wide rectangular seat; leans back, somewhat reclined backrest with twelve slats; high armrests that widen slightly from back to front; very short, spindly leg on wooden runners that widen towards back; comes with two off-white upholstered cushions with slight mosaic pattern
markings: Clark Collection label taped to bottom; Bekins sticker on bottom
title: Chair
